verses.name: Genesis 41:8
verses.text: And it came to pass in the morning that his spirit was troubled; and he sent and called for all the magicians of Egypt, and all the wise men thereof: and Pharaoh told them his dream; but there was none that could interpret them unto Pharaoh.

verses.name: Genesis 41:9
verses.text: Then spake the chief butler unto Pharaoh, saying, I do remember my faults this day:

verses.name: Genesis 41:10
verses.text: Pharaoh was wroth with his servants, and put me in ward in the captain of the guard’s house, both me and the chief baker:
